name: NeonBall
description: ¡Roll! ¡Jump! ¡Survive! NeonBall is an exciting maze-like game in a gorgeous neon-like environment.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: FX-4100 or Intel Equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD HD7850 or Nvidia Equivalent Storage: 2 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: AMD FX-6100 or Intel Equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: AMD 380X or Nvidia Equivalent Storage: 2 GB available space
